```{r setup, include=FALSE}

# Set output options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
options(knitr.kable.NA = '-')

# Include libraries
library(magrittr)

# Helper functions


# Prepare data
mri <-
  read.table("data/mri.txt", header = TRUE) %>%
  dplyr::as_tibble() %>%
  dplyr::select(race, diabetes, crt, obstime, death) %>% 
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(.data$crt)) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
    race = factor(race, labels = c("white", "black", "Asian", "other")),
    surv_5yr = dplyr::if_else(.data$obstime >= 5 * 365.25, 1, 0),
  )

```
